properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa samasthamu naa samasthamu naa Surakshakaa nee kiththu naa samastamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu prabho neeku nenu naa samastha miththunu Nee sannidhilo vasinchi aashatho breminthunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu prabho neeke nenu dosiloggi mrokkedan Theesivethu lokayaashal Yesu cherchumippude{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Needu vaada nenu Yesu neevu naadu vaadavu Neevu nenu nekamani nee shuddaatma sakshyamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu prabhoo neeku nannu neeya nene vachchiti Needu prema shaktinimpi needu deevena niyyave{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu neeve naa sarvaasthi haa sujwaalan bonditi Naa surakshanaanandamaa Halleluya stotramu{/lang-eng}
